sentences.en: Active & negative factor of indebted management, and keeping away of fundraising risk.
sentences.cn: 负债经营对企业的积极 和 消极作用, 以及筹资风险的防范.

sentences.en: For all this rich attire Miss Thorne was not indebted to the generosity of her brother.
sentences.cn: 索恩小姐的这种种考究的服装并不是靠了她兄弟的慷慨.

sentences.en: He'll always be indebted to you for what you have done.
sentences.cn: 对于你所做的事情,他会一直感激你.

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to all the doctors and nurses who treated me.
sentences.cn: 我深深地感激所有救治过我的医生和护士.

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to him for his help.
sentences.cn: 我非常感激他对我的帮助。

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to my family for all their help.
sentences.cn: 我深深感激我的家人给我的所有帮助。

sentences.en: I am deeply indebted to you for your assistance.
sentences.cn: 我很感激你对我的帮助.

sentences.en: I am greatly indebted to you for your criticisms and help.
sentences.cn: 我非常感激你的批评和帮助.

sentences.en: I am greatly indebted to you for your help.
sentences.cn: 我非常感激你对我的帮助.

sentences.en: I am indebted to you for kindness.
I'm indebted to all the staff who have been working so hard.
sentences.cn: 我十分感激一直如此努力工作的全体员工.

sentences.en: She is indebted to the library for most of her information.
sentences.cn: 她的学识多数是从这个图书馆得来的.

sentences.en: We are indebted to her for her help.
We are indebted to the ABC Company for your name and address.
sentences.cn: 我们从ABC公司获得贵方的名称的地址.

trans.tran_cn: 使负债；使受恩惠（indebt的过去分词）
使负债，使受恩惠(indebt的过去分词)
